verses.verse: Then Moab <WH4124> rebelled <WH6586> <WH8799> against Yisra'EL <WH3478> after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of Ach'av <WH256>.

And Ahaziah <WH274> fell down <WH5307> <WH8799> through a lattice <WH7639> in his upper chamber <WH5944> that was in SHomron <WH8111>, and was sick <WH2470> <WH8799>: and he sent <WH7971> <WH8799> messengers <WH4397>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Go <WH3212> <WH8798>, enquire <WH1875> <WH8798> of Baalzebub <WH1176> the god <WH430> of Ekron <WH6138> whether I shall recover <WH2421> <WH8799> of this disease <WH2483>.

But the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> said <WH1696> <WH8765> to Eliyahyahu <WH452> the Tishbite <WH8664>, Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, go up <WH5927> <WH8798> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> the messengers <WH4397> of the king <WH4428> of SHomron <WH8111>, and say <WH1696> <WH8761> unto them, Is it not because there is not a 'Elohim <WH430> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that ye go <WH1980> <WH8802> to enquire <WH1875> <WH8800> of Baalzebub <WH1176> the god <WH430> of Ekron <WH6138> ?

Now therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, Thou shalt not come down <WH3381> <WH8799> from that bed <WH4296> on which thou art gone up <WH5927> <WH8804>, but shalt surely <WH4191> <WH8800> die <WH4191> <WH8799>. And Eliyahyahu <WH452> departed <WH3212> <WH8799>.
And when the messengers <WH4397> turned back <WH7725> <WH8799> unto him, he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Why are ye now <WH2088> turned back <WH7725> <WH8804> ?

And they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, There came <WH5927> a man <WH376> up <WH5927> <WH8804> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> us, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto us, Go <WH3212> <WH8798>, turn again <WH7725> <WH8798> unto the king <WH4428> that sent <WH7971> <WH8804> you, and say <WH1696> <WH8765> unto him, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, Is it not because there is not a 'Elohim <WH430> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that thou sendest <WH7971> <WH8802> to enquire <WH1875> <WH8800> of Baalzebub <WH1176> the god <WH430> of Ekron <WH6138>? therefore thou shalt not come down <WH3381> <WH8799> from that bed <WH4296> on which thou art gone up <WH5927> <WH8804>, but shalt surely <WH4191> <WH8800> die <WH4191> <WH8799>.

And he said <WH1696> <WH8762> unto them, What manner <WH4941> of man <WH376> was he which came up <WH5927> <WH8804> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> you, and told <WH1696> <WH8762> you these words <WH1697> ?

And they answered <WH559> <WH8799> him, He was an hairy <WH8181> man <WH1167> <WH376>, and girt <WH247> <WH8803> with a girdle <WH232> of leather <WH5785> about his loins <WH4975>. And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, It is Eliyahyahu <WH452> the Tishbite <WH8664>.

Then the king <WH4428> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> unto him a captain <WH8269> of fifty <WH2572> with his fifty <WH2572>. And he went up <WH5927> <WH8799> to him: and, behold, he sat <WH3427> <WH8802> on the top <WH7218> of an hill <WH2022>. And he spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto him, Thou man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, the king <WH4428> hath said <WH1696> <WH8765>, Come down <WH3381> <WH8798>.

And Eliyahyahu <WH452> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH1696> <WH8762> to the captain <WH8269> of fifty <WH2572>, If I be a man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, then let fire <WH784> come down <WH3381> <WH8799> from heaven <WH8064>, and consume <WH398> <WH8799> thee and thy fifty <WH2572>. And there came down <WH3381> <WH8799> fire <WH784> from heaven <WH8064>, and consumed <WH398> <WH8799> him and his fifty <WH2572>.

Again <WH7725> <WH8799> also he sent <WH7971> <WH8799> unto him another <WH312> captain <WH8269> of fifty <WH2572> with his fifty <WH2572>. And he answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH1696> <WH8762> unto him, O man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, thus hath the king <WH4428> said <WH559> <WH8804>, Come down <WH3381> <WH8798> quickly <WH4120>.

And Eliyahyahu <WH452> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH1696> <WH8762> unto them, If I be a man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, let fire <WH784> come down <WH3381> <WH8799> from heaven <WH8064>, and consume <WH398> <WH8799> thee and thy fifty <WH2572>. And the fire <WH784> of 'Elohim <WH430> came down <WH3381> <WH8799> from heaven <WH8064>, and consumed <WH398> <WH8799> him and his fifty <WH2572>.

And he sent <WH7971> <WH8799> again <WH7725> <WH8799> a captain <WH8269> of the third <WH7992> fifty <WH2572> with his fifty <WH2572>. And the third <WH7992> captain <WH8269> of fifty <WH2572> went up <WH5927> <WH8799>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> and fell <WH3766> <WH8799> on his knees <WH1290> before <WH5048> Eliyahyahu <WH452>, and besought <WH2603> <WH8691> him, and said <WH1696> <WH8762> unto him, O man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, I pray thee, let my life <WH5315>, and the life <WH5315> of these fifty <WH2572> thy servants <WH5650>, be precious <WH3365> <WH8799> in thy sight <WH5869>.

Behold, there came <WH3381> fire <WH784> down <WH3381> <WH8804> from heaven <WH8064>, and burnt up <WH398> <WH8799> the two <WH8147> captains <WH8269> of the former <WH7223> fifties <WH2572> with their fifties <WH2572>: therefore let my life <WH5315> now be precious <WH3365> <WH8799> in thy sight <WH5869>.

And the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> said <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Eliyahyahu <WH452>, Go down <WH3381> <WH8798> with him: be not afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of him <WH6440>. And he arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and went down <WH3381> <WH8799> with him unto the king <WH4428>.

And he said <WH1696> <WH8762> unto him, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, Forasmuch as thou hast sent <WH7971> <WH8804> messengers <WH4397> to enquire <WH1875> <WH8800> of Baalzebub <WH1176> the god <WH430> of Ekron <WH6138>, is it not because there is no 'Elohim <WH430> in Yisra'EL <WH3478> to enquire <WH1875> <WH8800> of his word <WH1697>? therefore thou shalt not come down <WH3381> <WH8799> off that bed <WH4296> on which thou art gone up <WH5927> <WH8804>, but shalt surely <WH4191> <WH8800> die <WH4191> <WH8799>.

So he died <WH4191> <WH8799> according to the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> which Eliyahyahu <WH452> had spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>. And Yoram <WH3088> reigned <WH4427> <WH8799> in his stead in the second <WH8147> year <WH8141> of Yoram <WH3088> the son <WH1121> of Y'hoshafat <WH3092> king <WH4428> of Y'hudah <WH3063>; because he had no son <WH1121>.

Now the rest <WH3499> of the acts <WH1697> of Ahaziah <WH274> which he did <WH6213> <WH8804>, are they not written <WH3789> <WH8803> in the book <WH5612> of the chronicles <WH1697> <WH3117> of the kings <WH4428> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> ?
